page.title: 11Norton Secondary School
page.content: All pupils follow a common curriculum in Forms 1 and 2 of English, Drama, Library, History, Geography, R.E., French, Mathematics, Physical Science, Biological Science,Technical Studies, Home Economics, Art, P.E., Games and Swimming. In Forms 2 the 'A' classes commence German and in Form 3 the Sciences are split into Physics, Chemistry and Biology. Swimming is dropped. During the winter terms the buildings are used in the evenings by the Centre for Adult Education. There is an independent but County maintained Youth Club in its own buildings on a separate site 200 metres away. Teaching staff total 44 including 2 part-timers.Ancillary staff include bursar,clerks,teachers' aide, library assistant, workshop technician and laboratory assistant.
